shortdesc.ph: Occurs when the video device state changes.

p.codeblock: DECLARE_DYNAMIC_MULTICAST_DELEGATE_ThreeParams(FOnVideoDeviceStateChanged, FString, deviceId, int, deviceType, int, deviceState);
public virtual void OnVideoDeviceStateChanged(string deviceId, int deviceType, int deviceState)
final void Function(String deviceId, MediaDeviceType deviceType, MediaDeviceStateType deviceState)? onVideoDeviceStateChanged;

section.p: This callback reports the change of system video devices, such as being unplugged or removed. On a Windows device with an external camera for video capturing, the video disables once the external camera is unplugged.
section.note: This callback is for Windows and macOS only.

ul.li:
On the Windows platform:
(0): The device is ready for use.
(1): The device is in use.
(2): The device is disabled.
(4): The device is not found.
(8): The device is unplugged.

ul.li:
On the macOS platform:
0: The device is ready for use.
8: The device is unplugged.
